bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition identical with ji hou bi 急喉痹 , acute throat blockage. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry xuan shen 玄參 quotes Tai ping sheng hui fang 太平聖惠方 : 急喉痹風：不拘大人小兒。玄參、鼠粘子半生半 炒各一兩，為末，新水服一盞立瘥 , “For acute throat blockage wind , regardless of whether adults or children are concerned: Prepare a powder from 1 liang each of xuan shen and shu zhan zi , one half raw, the other half roasted, and ingest with one bowl of fresh water. This will bring an immediate cure”.
